alert.note: Alert for Sheep Range; Spring Mountains-Red Rock Canyon (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 16 at 3:18AM PST until January 17 at 4:00PM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM PST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Additional snow accumulations of 7 to 10 inches with higher amounts above 9000 feet. Southwest winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Sheep Range. * WHEN...Until 4 PM PST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning for snow means severe winter weather conditions will make travel very hazardous or impossible. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Sheep Range; Spring Mountains-Red Rock Canyon
